categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith actors

nodes.text: Patricia Ann Ruth Noble (February 3, 1944 – January 23, 2021) was an Australian singer-actress actress who portrayed Jobal Naberrie in both Attack of the Clones and Revenge of the Sith, although her scenes from Attack of the Clones did not appear in the final film.

Originally credited as Patsy Ann Noble, she rose to fame in Australia and the U.K. as a singer in the early 1960s before transitioning to acting later in the decade. She relocated to the U.S. in the 1970s and worked in television there before later relocating to Australia where she revived her musical career for the stage.
